attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.title: Read this!!
attributes.review:
Okay so let’s talk about this app, this app is the worst app ever like I download it to change my perspective of our “President” and it kept kicking me out like? Confused and another thing is that there was a weird orange puff Cheeto guy on the screen it was creeping me out. Another thing Is that it kept sending me notifications after I said don't allow the notification like common. I want to hear all about the BEST president but I am always busy so I never have time for this UGLY CHEETO LOOKING AS SELF OKAY SORRY ABOUT THAT BUT LIKE THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER TO EXIST PLZ REMOVE 
THIS APP AS SOON AS POSSIBLE PLZ AND THANk U ❤️🧚‍♀️💅🏻DEAR, GEN Z💅🏻❤️🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: These kids are dumber than we ever gave them credit for!!
attributes.review: We have literally raised  a generation of morons. They are writing fake reviews thinking that it will somehow stick it to our President. Hey idiots you do realize that you’ve literally pushed this to #1 in the news category. Guess you probably didn’t think this through and blindly followed the advice of another idiot. Try to think for yourselves for once, it’ll take you a lot further in life. We have lost an entire generation!
